thread.section_title: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. | www.blumberg.com
thread.title: BOWMAN GEORGE SCHEB
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by BOWMAN GEORGE SCHEB

author: BOWMAN GEORGE SCHEB
title: BOWMAN GEORGE SCHEB
text:
More testing of software with Post Office should be done. Recent problems with the roll out of the software change & the USPS forms resulted in the PO scanning devices inability to scan the barcodes that were produced by the software. Fortunately, after extensive contact with the Tech Spt group at Blumberg, the problem was resolved. However, we were stuck with some old forms (April 2015) that we need to get a credit to our account for future purchasing.
Timothy T. Scott
